Class UserPlane

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.Group
com.example.demo.actors.Actor.Actor
com.example.demo.actors.Actor.UserPlane
All Implemented Interfaces:
Destructible, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class UserPlane extends Actor
Represents the player's aircraft in the game, including movement, shooting, and power-up functionality.

  • Property Summary

    • setActorCollisionEnabled

      public void setActorCollisionEnabled(boolean enabled, int durationMs)
      Enables or disables collision detection for the plane, with an optional delay for reenabling.
      Parameters:
      enabled - Whether collision should be enabled.
      durationMs - The duration (in milliseconds) before reenabling collision, if disabled.
